title: WTB: T210 Series 6 Fred Toney will pay up to 375-400 for one
author: wacturner

posts.post_title: WTB: T210 Series 6 Fred Toney will pay up to 375-400 for one
posts.post_content:
Hi everyone this is the last request I will flood the board with on this card for a while.  If anyone has one I can pay up to 375-400 for a nice example of this card.  If anyone has one for sale please message me through the board or at [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url]  Thanks for your time

William A Turner
